name: Don't Let Me Down (Trev3lyan)
description:
Welcome to our entry for Ludum Dare 50!

Distract the dog from the inevitable truth with this waaacky balloon game. Use your boop snoot to delay the balloon from touching the ground. But what goes up must come down!

Coded by Trev3lyan with art by Althasor, with a stunning vocal performance by Charles, as the Dog.

Use the A/D and SPACE to move, and ESCAPE to open the Pause menu.
